tips.frostedheart.scenario_tip.title: Tips
tips.frostedheart.scenario_tip.desc3: Press &6[ESC]&r five times to skip cinematic
tips.frostedheart.sensible_temperature.d: The orb at the bottom of your screen displays your &6Apparent Temperature&r, which reflects whether you feel &b&lcold&r or &6&lhot&r in the current environment.

Note that &6Apparent Temperature &lis NOT&r &6Body Temperature&r, but rather a calculation result combining factors like ambient temperature, body heat, and clothing. The most comfortable perceived temperature is around &630°C&r (&686°F&r).
tips.frostedheart.murderer.title: Murderer
tips.frostedheart.murderer.desc1: You killed a non-hostile human being. Clearly, this won't do any good to your relationship with them.
tips.frostedheart.murderer.desc3: If you continue doing this, they might refuse to trade or communicate with you.
tips.frostedheart.maniac.title: Maniac
tips.frostedheart.plant.title: Planting
tips.frostedheart.plant.desc1: Simply scattering seeds on snow and expecting growth is clearly unrealistic. Crops now require &bsuitable environmental conditions&r to grow.
tips.frostedheart.plant.desc2: Hold &6[S]&r while hovering seed in the inventory to view its planting information.
tips.frostedheart.soil_temperature.title: Soil Temperature
tips.frostedheart.soil_temperature.desc1: Crops require suitable soil temperatures to grow. When soil temperature exceeds the survival range, crops will begin to wither, while suitable temperatures accelerate growth.
tips.frostedheart.soil_temperature.desc2: Soil temperature is influenced by natural factors such as &bweather&r, &baltitude&r, and &bbiome&r.
tips.frostedheart.soil_temperature.desc3: Heat sources like campfires and torches do not affect soil temperature; only &6more advanced heating equipment&r can heat the soil.
tips.frostedheart.soil_temperature.desc4: Soil temperature is not directly displayed. You must research and unlock the {item.frostedheart.soil_thermometer} to measure it.
tips.frostedheart.shelter_and_light.desc: Most crops require &bSunlight (Sky Light)&r to grow properly. However, during severe weather like blizzards, exposed crops may be destroyed. You may need to build shelters using &btransparent blocks&r like glass to protect them.
tips.frostedheart.fertilizer.title: Fertilizer
tips.frostedheart.fertilizer.desc1: Fertilizers provide various growth benefits to crops. Hold &6[Shift]&r while hovering fertilizer in the inventory to view specific effects.
tips.frostedheart.fertilizer.desc2: There are three types of fertilizer: Growth Acceleration, Yield Booster, and Preserved, each with three tiers: Basic, Advanced, and Modern. Higher-tier fertilizers offer stronger effects.
tips.frostedheart.fertilizer.desc3: Hold fertilizer and right-click on soil or crops to apply it. Each soil block can hold up to 2 units of the same fertilizer, which are gradually consumed as crops grow.
tips.frostedheart.soil_thermometer.desc1: Hold the {item.frostedheart.soil_thermometer} to view real-time information such as planting temperature and remaining fertilizer levels on the screen.
tips.frostedheart.infrared_view.title: Infrared Vision
tips.frostedheart.infrared_view.desc1: Your glasses are equipped with infrared vision. Press &6[I]&r to view temperature area variations.
tips.frostedheart.ponder.title: Ponder
tips.frostedheart.ponder.desc1: Pondering helps you intuitively understand an item or block's functionality. When an item has a ponder prompt, hold &6[W]&r to enter the pondering scene.
tips.frostedheart.wheel_menu.title: Radial Menu
tips.frostedheart.wheel_menu.desc1: Hold &6[Tab]&r to open the radial menu and access various quick functions. Select &b[{gui.frostedheart.wheel_menu.selection.archive}]&r to view all obtained tips.
tips.frostedheart.wheel_menu.desc2: Not enough keys? Select &b[{gui.wheel_menu.editor.edit}]&r to add custom options, including Key Binds and Commands, and hide or rearrange selections.
